infoSection.name: Renan Oliveira
infoSection.title: I'm a software developer
infoSection.description: I'm a specialist in web interface development, and graduated as a full-stack web developer at Trybe. My current goal is to keep improving my skills as a front-end developer, but I have experience working with many other types of coding. You can read about that on the Work tab. My permanent goal is to always be a clean coder.

aboutSection.title: 1. About me
paragraphs: Hi! My name is Renan and I work as a web and mobile developer. I'm also an automation technician, and when I was studying it, I had my first contact with programming. Since then, I've learned a lot of things related to development.

I've gratuaded as a Full Stack Web Developer at Trybe, one of the biggest schools of programming in South America. That's when I started to work professionally and exclusevily with software engineering. I already worked as a front-end, back-end and mobile engineer.

skillsSection.title: Backend Developer
skillsSection.description: As a Backend developer, I manage and model databases, build API's and manage the flow of messages trough the cloud.

skillsSection.title: Frontend Developer
skillsSection.description: As a Frontend developer, I build interfaces, manage the comunication back for front, and even design myself some of the interfaces i build.

skillsSection.title: Other skills
skillsSection.description: As a software engineer, I've worked with a lot of other technologies and patterns.
